title: ProductAvails Availability array
description: Defines the response to a request for product availability in terms of Availability, Partial Availability and Unavailabiliy and Context

$schema.description: $schema only included to aid validation of JSON, should not be used in real calls.

Status.title: Status
Status.description: Summary definition of the inventory desctibed in the Targeting Array as Available, Partially Available or Unavailable

Reason.title: Reason
Reason.description: State the reason if Partially Available ot Unavailable

Comment.title: Comment
Comment.description: Free text for an availability comment

Context.title: Context
Context.description: Array of OOHbjects describing the context of any Partially Available or Unavailable status e.g. This could be a frame that is causing a duplication error

Targeting.title: Targeting
Targeting.description: Array of OOHbjects describing the inventory that is Available,  Partially Available or Unavailable statuses
